about_the_game:
Relaxed first person simulator where you manage a little hotel / resort, where you renovate and customize the customer's room furniture to your taste

After the customers have been checked in at the reception, and spent a day at your hotel you will need to clean their rooms at the start of the day, by picking the dirty towels, cleaning the floor stains, restocking the room's clean towels and lastly make their beds

You can unlock more facilities, like the bar where you can make and serve drinks to your customers. At the unlockable eating area you can order food supplies, after they arrive in cardboard boxes just outside the building you can store them and stock the food on the food boards in the eating area

There's also a swimming pool to be unlocked, so your customers can enjoy getting some sun and rest on the swimming pool chairs, and in return you get extra profit every day

Modifying the Customer's room furniture

Cleaning the Customer's room at the start of the day

Making drinks at the bar

Unlocking the Bar allows you to make multiple drink types and serve them to your Customers

Stocking food at the Eating area

Unlocking the Eating area allows you to serve buffet food to your customers
